title: Classic Hamburger
description: A juicy beef patty served on a soft sesame bun with lettuce, tomato, and onion.

title: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce topped with tender grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, and croutons.

title: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork served on a brioche bun with coleslaw and BBQ sauce.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.
